name: Durga Puja Tour.
description: Goddess Durga  Invites you to Delhi this October for the pious and colorful festival of Durga Puja. Here One gets to observe and participate in the Durga Puja Celebrations along with the friendly and warm Bengalis of Delhi  and  absorb the energy of all the traditions and rituals that are practiced during the Puja like Udbodhan, Anjali, Arati , Sidur Khala, Visarjan. The food is exotic and the celebrations make you feel great. The sound of the Drums locally called the Dhak and the festive riot of the colours of the elaborately decorated Premises or Pandals ( tents ) and the lively atmosphere filled with music, dance and plays create an unforgettable experience that you would like to  return back for every year.
